Articles.Content: I am Tammy Turner from Los Angeles, California. Currently, I am taking my vacataion out of the country and I am taking my free time to write blogs about home improvement and business technology tips. I am a freelance blogger. Thanks for letting me in. I find your site interesting. Hope to meet yah all!

Hello Tammyturner and welcome to the forum!

We have a very interesting community here.  It is very international and many members have a deep interest in science and, of course, space.  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!
